name: E-ternity
description:
E-ternity

This game is about a man who just wants to watch his youtube video in peace. But oh wait! There are many things trying to stop him from doing so: Annoying ads, messages from Mom and Dad, Boss wanting him to do the work he is supposed to do in Homeoffice. Try to dodge the Ads and avoid buying useless Junk, ignore your boss and family and try to spend as much time as possible watching the legendary "Aerobics Rat"!
